last_episode_to_air.name: Daughter of the Alamo
last_episode_to_air.overview: When an arrest leads to a tip on an unsolved murder case, Molly must work with the retired Ranger whose case it was; Billy must decide between capturing a drug cartel leader or keeping his family safe.

name: Killer Women
overview: Of all the notorious lawmen that ever patrolled the violent frontier, none are more storied than ballsy and badass Molly Parker, one of the first women to join the Texas Rangers.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Of all the notorious lawmen who have ever patrolled the violent Texas frontier, none are more storied than the Texas Rangers. But being the only female ranger in this elite squad isn't going to stop badass Molly Parker (Tricia Helfer). Molly is committed to finding the truth and seeing justice served. While she's surrounded by law enforcement colleagues who want to see her fail, including Police Lieutenant Guillermo Salazar (Vic Trevino), the Rangers have her back, led by Company Commander Luis Zea (Alex Fernandez). Molly has also got her brother, Billy (Michael Trucco), and his wife Nessa (Marta Milans). On the verge of getting divorced from her smarmy husband, Jake (Jeffrey Nordling), Molly begins an affair with sexy DEA Agent Dan Winston (Marc Blucas).

episodes.name: Some Men Need Killing
episodes.overview: When a man is killed at a black-tie gala, it leads Molly to chase down an assassin who has been killing off abusive husbands. Meanwhile, Jake is still doing his best to delay theirâ€¦

episodes.name: Warrior
episodes.overview: A veteran missing the adrenaline rush she experienced during war decides to become a modern-day Robin Hood; Becca thinks Billy is having an affair.

episodes.name: The Siren
episodes.overview: Molly hunts a serial killer whose victims remind her of her own mother; Molly introduces Dan to her family; Becca plans Hailee's Quinceanera.

episodes.name: In and Out
episodes.overview: Molly is on the case when a famous basketball star is murdered in his home. Meanwhile, Becca plans a date night to let Billy in on some life changing news, and Dan receives a credible tip leading to an arrest of an unlikely suspect.

episodes.name: Daughter of the Alamo
episodes.overview: When an arrest leads to a tip on an unsolved murder case, Molly must work with the retired Ranger whose case it was; Billy must decide between capturing a drug cartel leader or keeping his family safe.

But being the only female ranger in this elite squad isn't going to stop badass Molly Parker (Tricia Helfer). Molly is committed to finding the truth and seeing justice served. While she's surrounded by law enforcement colleagues who want to see her fail, including Police Lieutenant Guillermo Salazar (Vic Trevino), the Rangers have her back, led by Company Commander Luis Zea (Alex Fernandez). Molly has also got her brother, Billy (Michael Trucco), and his wife Nessa (Marta Milans).
